channel.title: Trading Window: Items Wealth
channel.description:
Hey, I was interested in Removing the wealth of items. (So in trade mode you can NOT see the amount of whatever something is worth.)
If anyone knew how to do this, i'd appreciate it. This is on a 667 source.

item.title: Trading Window: Items Wealth
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Danny Roggia, post:3, topic:446166”][quote]/**
* Gets trade value
*
* @return returns initial price
*/
private int getTradersItemsValue() {
int initialPrice = 0;
for (Item item : traderItemsOffered.toArray()) {
if (item != null) {
initialPrice += item.getDefinitions().getValue()
* item.getAmount();
}
}
return initialPrice;
}

/**
 * gets Value of partner
 * 
 * @return regular price
 */
private int getPartnersItemsValue() {
	int initialPrice = 0;
	for (Item item : partnerItemsOffered.toArray()) {
		if (item != null) {
			initialPrice += item.getDefinitions().getValue()
					* item.getAmount();
		}
	}
	return initialPrice;
}

[/quote]

I believe this is it.[/quote]

Ok tip: use [code = java ], not quote.

So just comment those out.

[code=java]/*private int getTradersItemsValue() {
*int initialPrice = 0;
*for (Item item : traderItemsOffered.toArray()) {
* if (item != null) {
* initialPrice += item.getDefinitions().getValue()
* * item.getAmount();
* }
*}
*return initialPrice;
*/}

/**
 * gets Value of partner
 * 
 * @return regular price
 */
/*private int getPartnersItemsValue() {
	*int initialPrice = 0;
	*for (Item item : partnerItemsOffered.toArray()) {
	*	*if (item != null) {
	*		*initialPrice += item.getDefinitions().getValue()
	*				//* item.getAmount();
	*	}
	*}
	*return initialPrice;
*/}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Trading Window: Items Wealth
item.dc:creator: @Danny_Roggia Danny Roggia
item.description:
@Danny_Roggia wrote:

/** * Gets trade value * * @return returns initial price */ private int getTradersItemsValue() { int initialPrice = 0; for (Item item : traderItemsOffered.toArray()) { if (item != null) { initialPrice += item.getDefinitions().getValue() * item.getAmount(); } } return initialPrice; } 
/**
 * gets Value of partner
 * 
 * @return regular price
 */
private int getPartnersItemsValue() {
	int initialPrice = 0;
	for (Item item : partnerItemsOffered.toArray()) {
		if (item != null) {
			initialPrice += item.getDefinitions().getValue()
					* item.getAmount();
		}
	}
	return initialPrice;
}</blockquote>

I believe this is it.

Read full topic

item.title: Trading Window: Items Wealth
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I’d imagine if you change one of the values in items.cfg that has to do with the wealth value. Or just search where the wealth value is getting those values from and comment it out.

Read full topic
